title: Buddha's Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Opened Feb 2014, this restaurant offers a primarily raw food menu that's gluten-free. Has cold-pressed veggie and fruit juices, blended smoothies, raw cakes and entrees like raw burger and raw pizza. Honey is used as sweetener in some items - ask. Location is next to Zen Yoga and diagonally across from the church/park.
